content: materials simply soft 170 g/6 oz 288 m/315 yds 2 colors 2 balls each 4 balls total crochet hook size k10 5/6 5mm crochet hook size 7/4 5mm sewing thread and needle for flower pin back 1 1/4 long for flower wrap is worked with 1 strand each of a and b held together wrap is shaped and features crochet edging different options for decreasing are provided flower embellishment is worked in rounds and measures approximately 3 /7 6 cm in diameter
